statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$branch" ] && git_info=" ($branch)" || git_info=""; else git_info=""; fi; printf "%s@%s:%s%s | %s" "$user" "$host" "$cwd" "$git_info" "$model"
